1.0.name: wordpress/authors
1.0.description: Authors Widget shows the list or cloud of the authors, with the number of posts, link to RSS feed next to their name, avatar. It is useful in a multi-author blog, where you want to have the list in the sidemenu. The widget can also display an "Author Cloud" if SEO Tag Cloud plugin is installed.
